en: Our teacher must have studied English hard when he was a high school student.
tr: Öğretmenimiz lisedeyken İngilizce'ye çok çalışmış olmalı.

en: Our teacher hates his students to ask questions while he is giving a lecture.
tr: Öğretmenimiz ders anlatırken öğrencilerinin soru sormasından hoşlanmaz.

en: Our teacher demonstrated the experiment in chemistry.
Our teacher ordered Jim to go home at once.
tr: Öğretmenimiz Jim'e hemen eve git dedi.

en: Our teacher is in a good temper.
Our teacher is always cool.
Our teacher is not always kind to us.
Our teacher always tells us that keeping up with world events by reading the newspaper is very important.
tr: Öğretmenimiz bize hep gazete okuyarak dünya gündemini takip etmenin çok önemli olduğunu söyler.

en: Our teacher looks very young.
Our teacher often overlooked his name on the list.
tr: Öğretmenimiz listede ismini sık sık atlardı.

en: Our teacher is, as it were, a walking dictionary.
Our teacher is well spoken of.
I do not know the woman talking to our teacher.
I don't know the woman talking to our teacher.
I don't know the woman who's talking to our teacher.
If you compare our product with others, you'll see ours is far better in quality.
tr: Ürünümüzü diğerleriyle karşılaştırırsan, bizimkinin kalitede çok daha iyi olduğunu göreceksin.

en: We heard the echo of our voices from the other side of the valley.
tr: Vadinin karşı tarafından seslerimizin yankısını duyduk.

en: Our life depends largely on oil imported from other countries.
tr: Hayatımız büyük ölçüde diğer ülkelerden ithal edilen petrole bağlı.

en: Our success was, in the main due to his efforts.
tr: Başarımız esas olarak onun çabaları sayesinde oldu.

en: Our success was due to his efforts.
Our success depend on your efforts.
Our success, after all, is due to his earnest efforts.
tr: Başarımız, ne de olsa, onun büyük çabaları sayesinde.

en: Our characters are completely different.
Do not leave our generation without hope.
Let's try to make our world better.
tr: Dünyamızı daha iyi yapmak için çalışalım.

en: Our world is getting smaller and smaller.
Our math teacher drew a circle on the blackboard.
tr: Matematik öğretmenimiz tahtaya bir daire çizdi.

en: We have a lot of English books in the library.
tr: Kütüphanemizde çok sayıda İngilizce kitap var.

en: I can't think of any other way of getting him to accept our proposal.
tr: Teklifimizi kabul ettirmek için başka bir yol aklıma gelmiyor.

en: It is bold of him to refuse our offer.
What do you think of our new abode?
It is in April that our school years start.
Our diet is full of variety.
All our food was rotten.
Our office is very comfortable with air conditioning.
The train we'll be on will arrive at 9 p.m.
The plane we were aboard was flying over the Pacific toward Wake Island at a height of 3,000 meters.
tr: Bindiğimiz uçak, 3000 metre yükseklikte Pasifik üzerinde Wake Adası'na doğru uçuyordu.

en: Our plane was about thirty minutes late.
Our plane took off at exactly twelve o'clock.
tr: Uçağımız tam saat on ikide kalktı.

en: Our ship was approaching the harbor.
Our boss looks over every paper presented to him.
tr: Patronumuz kendisine sunulan her belgeyi gözden geçirir.

en: Our request for a pay rise was turned down.
Our request for a pay raise was turned down.
Our paths have crossed very often.
Our meeting was quite accidental.
Let's keep beautiful nature around us.
He works too slowly to be helpful to us.
tr: Bize yardımcı olamayacak kadar yavaş çalışıyor.

en: Do you need our help?
Our letters crossed each other.
Our chief concern should be the aging of society.
Our car happened to pass theirs by the station.
Our car is three years older than yours.
tr: Arabamız seninkinden üç yaş daha büyük.

en: Our car ran out of petrol after ten minutes.
tr: On dakika sonra arabamızın benzini bitti.

en: Let's see if our cars have enough gas.
tr: Bakalım arabalarımızda yeterli benzin var mı?

en: Please accept our heartfelt apologies.
What passes for leisure in our society is actually time-consuming.
tr: Toplumumuzda eğlence diye geçen şey aslında zaman alıcıdır.

en: Our office is located the center of the city.
Our office is located in the center of the town.
Our office is on the northern side of the building.
Our dog was run over by a truck.
All our attempts were in vain.
Our thought is expressed by means of words.
Our thought is expressed by means of language.
Our city doesn't have enough public institutions for the aged.
tr: Şehrimizde yaşlılar için yeterli kamu kurumu yok.
